title: PlayStation 5 Disc Console (New 2023 Slim Model )- UAE Version, 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty

raw_desc: Slim Design - With PS5 Disc Console, players get powerful gaming technology packed inside a sleek and compact console design. Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high-speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers and 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games Breathtaking Immersion - discover a deeper gaming experience with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio technology Vertical Stand sold separately
